column4: to update to edgy, do you have to wait until the 26th to get the non-beta?
to update to edgy, do you have to wait until the 26th to get the non-beta?
are there any Ubuntu programs that I can use to transcode from .m4a (apple's unprotected) to .mp3?
yes, mplayer
yes.
search google, there are a couple of scripts.
Places>Search for files...
put in name contains "*.m4a"
or select more options..
well the default is to look in your /home... you can change that
works just fine for me.
Look for in... select "Filesystem" and for the Name contains *.m4a
Places>Search for files...
did you get it? it wont find any m4a files if you dont have any on your ubuntu install
i'm on edgy, might make a difference.
Yeah. I've been running edgy since knot 1
you can try *.m4a in "Name matches Regular Expression" i dont know if that will work or not
sudo find / -name *.m4a
type that in terminal
it will take a minute or so for the command to finish but it will search your system for any filenames that have .m4a
did that work for you? find anything?
